item.description: We will continue with the 3rd book of volume one of The World as Will and Representation. Please remember that this time around we plan to cover only volume one (4 books plus an appendix of criticism of Kantian philosophy). So probably two more meetings on Schopenhauer before we plan to move on.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the philosophy group from the staff.
item.name: Schopenhauer: The World as Will and Representation III
